allow: Bash(wrangler d1 execute fishermn-db --remote --command "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN address IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as no_address, SUM(CASE WHEN address IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_address FROM businesses")
Bash(wrangler d1 execute fishermn-db --remote --command "SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude, address, created_at FROM businesses WHERE name LIKE ''%Ballard%'' ORDER BY created_at")

Bash(wrangler d1 execute fishermn-db --remote --command "SELECT id, name, lake_id, latitude, longitude, ROUND(latitude, 2) as lat_rounded, ROUND(longitude, 2) as lng_rounded FROM businesses WHERE name IS NOT NULL AND latitude IS NOT NULL GROUP BY lake_id, ROUND(latitude, 2), ROUND(longitude, 2) HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 LIMIT 30")
